protein.specific_function: May regulate calcium-dependent activities in the endoplasmic reticulum lumen or post-ER compartment

reference.reference_text: Ozawa M: Cloning of a human homologue of mouse reticulocalbin reveals conservation of structural domains in the novel endoplasmic reticulum resident Ca(2+)-binding protein with multiple EF-hand motifs. J Biochem. 1995 May;117(5):1113-9.
